Minigame

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • Minigame.Note

  • public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
    node that scrolls up the screen and must be hit at the right location
    Author:
    Emily

    • Constructor Detail

      • Note

        public Note(int pitch,
            int tempo,
            int start)
        Parameters:
        pitch - which column note scrolls along
        tempo - how fast note is moving
        start - note's initial location

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Parameters:
        drawer - interface that draws the note

      • hit

        public int hit(int target)
        detects how far note is from goal and deteremines if it counts as a successful hit
        Parameters:
        target - where note ideally should be hit
        Returns:
        successfulness of hit (1 = success, -1 = miss)

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Returns:
        gets note's position along the column

      • getPitch

        public int getPitch()
        Returns:
        which column note resides in (return 1-5)
